abstract: “I’m not intimidated,” said Senator Richard Shelby, Republican of Alabama. “That was probably a little bit overboard.”
lead_paragraph: Republicans continued to complain Saturday about Representative Adam B. Schiff’s “head on a pike” comment from the night before, with one saying it was so offensive because of its implication that senators were running scared and were intimidated by President Trump. That suggest did not go down well on the Senate floor.
